item.title: container.yml
item.description: Usage There are two alternative workflows (due to numerous actions limitations) depending on which type of authentication you use between Github Actions and GCP. item.title: container-oidc.yml
item.description: Usage There are two alternative workflows (due to numerous actions limitations) depending on which type of authentication you use between Github Actions and GCP. If you want to use Basic or Service Account authentication then see container.yml Using OIDC Authentication 1build:2uses:erzz/workflows/.github/workflows/container-oidc.yml@main3with:4registry:"eu.gcr.io"5image:image-path/image-name6secrets:7wip:projects/012345678901/locations/global/workloadIdentityPools/github/providers/github8service-account:my-service-account@my-project.iam.gserviceaccount.comSecrets Input Required Details wip for OIDC auth The workload identity provider to use with the container-oidc.yml workflow service-account for OIDC auth The service account to impersonate when using the container-oidc.
